body: using OpenEdge.Net.HTTP.RequestBuilder.
using OpenEdge.Net.HTTP.IHttpRequest.
using OpenEdge.Net.HTTP.IHttpResponse.
using OpenEdge.Net.HTTP.ClientBuilder.
def var baseUrl as char no-undo.
def var apiRoute as char no-undo.
def var oRequest as IHttpRequest no-undo.
def var oResponse as IHttpResponse no-undo.
baseUrl = "${1:base-url}".
apiRoute = "/${2:api-route}".
oRequest = RequestBuilder:Get(baseUrl + apiRoute):Request.
oResponse = ClientBuilder:Build():Client:Execute(oRequest).
def var ${1:oJson} as JsonObject no-undo.
$1 = cast(${2:oResponse}:Entity, JsonObject).
def var ${1:oJson} as JsonArray no-undo.
$1 = cast(${2:oResponse}:Entity, JsonArray).
def var ${1:varName} as ${2:char} no-undo.
def temp-table ${1:ttName} no-undo
field ${2:fieldName} as ${3:char}.
procedure ${1:procName}:
end procedure.
function ${1:functionName} returns ${2:char} (input ${3:parameterName} as ${4:char}):
return.
end function.

DEF VAR AS CHAR NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as character no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as character no-undo.

DEF VAR AS INT64 NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as int64 no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as int64 no-undo.

DEF VAR AS HANDLE NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as handle no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as handle no-undo.

DEF VAR AS DATE NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as date no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as date no-undo.

DEF VAR AS DECIMAL NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as decimal no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as decimal no-undo.

DEF VAR AS DATETIME NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as datetime no-undo

DEF VAR AS LONGCHAR NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as longchar no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as longchar no-undo.

DEF VAR AS MEMPTR NO-UNDO.description: Define a variable as memptr no-undo
body: def var ${1:varName} as memptr no-undo.

DEF INPUT PARAM AS CHAR NO-UNDO.description: Define input parameter as character no-undo
body: def input param ${1:varName} as character no-undo.
